# akp_clusters (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "akp_instance" "example" {
  name = "test"
}

data "akp_clusters" "example" {
  instance_id = data.akp_instance.example.id
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
